name: Quattro Super Hits
overview: This is from Codemasters' Quattro series of four-game compilations, featuring four of their original budget titles: Super Stuntman: This action shoot ‘em up has an unusual setting, pitching you as a movie stuntman trying to complete the toughest scenes of the latest blockbuster. Super Tank Simulator: 8 challenging zones of battle await you in your role as a tank driver. The game is viewed from above, with rotational control and forward/reverse power for the tank. The routes to travel along are narrow and varied, so some exploration is required – some paths are inevitably safer and faster than others. SuperHero: Five guardians threaten the peaceful existence of the people, and it’s you who’s been entrusted with saving them. KGB Super Spy: There are a group of scientists in East Germany who want to defect to the West. Problem is the authorities want them to stay to help develop a new weapon. You must fly over five missions to help get these scientists into the West. In the first four missions you must collect six scientists on each mission and take them to a safe house. On the fifth mission you must take these scientists over the border to West Germany.
